website_summaries.verdict: An extra-strength antiperspirant that helps control sweat for up to seven days per use.
pros: Features an FDA-compliant formula that ensures the product can be used safely at all times
Can be used to address hyperhidrosis, nervous sweating, underarm sweating, and much more
Easy to apply in just seconds
cons: Sometimes causes a burning sensation or rash following initial use

customer_reviews.title: Just Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all, not even for a few minutes. The reason why they have so many positive reviews is because there is a note-card in the box that says they offer free products to those who leave positive reviews. Most of the positive reviews for this item were bought by the seller. I also tried returning this item under their return policy stated in the description, and they would not allow me to.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Order straight from sweatblock website
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the same as the ones I've been ordering from sweatblocks website. The ones ordered on amazon irritated my skin bad and didn't stop my sweating. Ordering straight from sweatblock website from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's worse than sweaty armpits?
customer_reviews.text: What's worse than sweaty armpits? Sweaty, SWOLLEN armpits with a chemical burn! I followed the directions exactly. About 10 minutes after application, my armpits began to burn, not itch. I have a high pain tolerance so I went on to bed with the burning and woke up in the morning still with mild burning. Took a shower to rinse it off and saw that my armpits were swollen and red with a chemical burn. They burned off and on all day. On top of it all, sweating didn't decrease AT ALL. Plus, this horrible stuff can't be returned! Would I recommend this? No, except to someone I disliked enough to want to torture.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Works for some but not for others (me)
customer_reviews.text: Let me being by saying this might work great for you. I read all of the reviews and decided to give it a try. I contacted the company a couple of times because I wasn't having any success and asked for advice. I suffered through the burning and itching. After 3 purchases over several weeks, I finally gave up. I have a bad sweating problem and it is embarrassing so I've tried just about everything. Unfortunately, this did not work for me. I did not ask for my money back and I sure gave it the old college try but now I need to see if there is anything else left that I can try.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brody

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I sweat a lot and was told by my doctor to give this a try. All it did for me was make my skin sting for a while and smell horrible. I could put up with that if this were to have even slightly alleviated my sweating, but I'm still needing to change sweat soaked hats and shirts multiple times a day. This might be better for people with mild sweating, but if you sweat enough to soak through a shirt or hat/headband in a couple of hours this isn't going to help.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: It Burns!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I'm surprised no one has mentioned this yet, so maybe I just have really sensitive skin, but it burns when you apply it. I followed the directions exactly, but about 10 minutes later my armpits would not stop itching and burning. The itchy, burning sensation calmed down a little after an hour or two, but it didn't go away entirely for a few days. I really wanted to like this product because my sweating is pretty embarrassing at times, but the idea of going through that torture again for multiple days keeps me from giving it a second try.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!!! 🙌🙌
customer_reviews.text: My family has thyroid issues and I unfortunately deal with hyperthyroidism which causes lots of sweating, I've dealt with this since highschool that I can remember, I've tired almost every deodorant out there from men's to organic, aluminum free, clinical strength deodorants. You name it I've tried it, nothing has ever work until i came across sweatblock, I have NEVER been more impressed with a product. Sweatblock has literally given me so much confidence that I no longer have to worry about pools of sweat coming from my under arms and I can wear colored shirts yes COLORED SHIRTS!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No more sweat!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely self conscious about my back sweat and thought this product would help with my extreme sweating problem. I noticed a major difference in sweat production and also in body temperature. I felt like the product was working because I felt a cooling sensation on my back that made heat more bearable. I definitely would recommend this product, however I would caution that it could cause some skin irritation for sensitive skin types. I did notice a minor outbreak of bumps, maybe acne forming in my lower back. It goes away after a few days, but I would be cautious if using in an area of skin that is showing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Chan

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOTHING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was very excited to try. Several of my medications cause major excessive sweating and I’ve been searching for the past 6 years for something that works. My dr has tried several RX meds and NOTHING helps. I thought I’d give this a try but nope-I thought even if it just helped with underarm sweating it would be worth it. I tried applying this on my underarms, chest, neck-it literally did NOTHING!!!! I followed directions and applied for the next several nights and NOTHING!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the curiosity!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. Within minutes the product started to burn and it didn't stop. I had to wipe off with soap. I will say the number they provide within the package for customer service was really helpful. There was a response within 2 minutes of texting.
customer_reviews.author: Vermont Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. Id give it zero stars if it would let me. I’m very disappointed that it didn’t work. Nothing changed. I read others reviews and I was hoping I would have a similar experience but no it did not work. Used it as instructed in directions but I feel like the problem may have gotten worse. I don’t know, all I know is that I still have a problem and we can’t even get refunded for this bogus magic trick
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: This gave me a very painful rash under both my arms. It’s like a cross between a rash and a bunch of boils. It hurts to move. I’ve never had this problem with an antiperspirant before. What in the world is in this that would cause such a reaction?
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know honestly - maybe it’s with a try
customer_reviews.text: It has an odd smell to it, not necessarily bad, but kind of unpleasant. I did have some skin tingling and slight redness at times, but not so bad as to keep me from continuing to use the product. I do not have sensitive skin, though I could see that being a problem for someone who does. I feel like this product kind of worked, but honestly it’s hard to say. I still sweated, but not as bad. Take that for what you will.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was game changing for me. This picture is after a full day of work. That top has been in my closet for a year with tags still on, because I was too afraid to sweat it out. Wore it after day 3 of trying this. The product says it last 7 days, it worked for 10 days for me. I could actually wear tops that weren't black!! Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Meks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works amazingly well, the short story is I highly recommend it if you happen to sweat beyond your comfort level. Here are some bullet points, 1.) It's been effective regardless of location, but I primarily use it on my forehead, face, and neck. 2.) I'd say my skin is "sensitive" (aka: crappy) but this product did not cause any breakouts/rash/inflammation (though it's a little itchy when you first apply it) 3.) As for effectiveness, the key is to follow the instructions exactly and be sure to let your skin dry, but it's awesome. 4.) It's great for heat or anxiety-induced sweat (the latter being my primary usage)
customer_reviews.author: Drone

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!!! I put it on and followed ...
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous!!! I put it on and followed the instructions. It is over three months later and I still have rash
customer_reviews.author: Zac Blau

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Effective
customer_reviews.text: With the onset of menopause, I started sweating profusely, and became an embarrassment with sweat stains on shirts. previously used antiperspirants did not help. I tried prescription strength/charcoal based to no avail. I overheard friends talk about sweat pads. I researched it on Amazon, read reviews on Sweat Block. It works. Its been two weeks since I purchased the product, I used the towelettes two nights in a row. I have not experienced sweaty armpits since I used Sweat Block. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronkuz

customer_reviews.title: I'm.... DRY!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OK, this stuff is ridiculous! I did *NOT* think it would work. In fact, the first night, it didn't work! So, I was all 'OK, what the hell, I'll trim my hair and try it again'. ....... I've been mostly-dry for nearly a week. I ordered two more boxes because I haven't felt like this since pre-puberty! HOW DOES THIS WORK?!?! I mean, I know the science behind it, but geez! This stuff is awesome. If you have hairypits, you might want to trim. Dry your underarms completely, apply liberally, let it dry, and go the hell to sleep. Sheer awesomeness!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I am an excessive sweater. I tried just about every antiperspirant available, even "clinical" strength. I have canaried every white t-shirt and ruined countless dress shirts. I started using this and that has all ended. As a routine, I put this on Sunday night after a shower and let it dry (as directed by the instructions). The next morning I put on deodorant and go through the day with extremely little to no sweating. I typically shower every morning before heading to work. I work two to five times a week and shower after that. Even with all that, I go a whole week with one application and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have only cranium sweats and it works very well. There is no scent and if you apply the night before and in the morning you can shower or rinse it off. I only use it only face, hairline and neck and when you first apply, it may tingle/sting for a few minutes. Get it time and it will stop stinging and is well worth it. Now , I can apply makeup with out it dripping off with in an hour! This lasts a week or more on my face .
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: It works but not as long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried the product and it worked very well for up to four days then wore out (exactly the same happened the following times) For those who are complaining of awful pain or burn, the problem is not the product, most likely is that you shave right before applying it. When you shave, you’re causing microscopic cuts to your skin therefore feel burning sensation if apply almost anything (DO NOT SHAVE JUST BEFORE USING THE PRODUCT). I shaved then waited for 2 days for the skin to regenerate before applying the product and only felt minimum tingling for 2-3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki S.

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: So, I have the prettiest cotton dresses for work, but by the time I get home they are wet under the arms and stained. I bought Sweat Block. I didn't follow the directions exactly, I'm a bit ashamed to say. I dabbed, but tried to make one swab last for two applications. That didn't work because the next day my dress was wet under one arm on the ride home. That night, last night, I followed the instructions completely and I am happy to say that I'm bone dry. Day two...bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie C.

customer_reviews.title: No sweat
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I overheat easily and have always been a heavy sweater. No amount of antiperspirant was ever able to get me through a day without sweating. This product has been a complete game changer! I used the wipes at night for about three days (with a single swipe of deodorant in the morning). I do not sweat at all. I’m able to get through an entire 12 hour shift at the hospital (and gym workouts) without ridiculous pit sweat. I have zero irritation with this product and fully intend to continue using it. I’m only sorry that I waited so long (and ruined so many shirts) before researching and trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Life changer.
customer_reviews.text: I have had hyperhidrosis since puberty. After trying prescription strength antiperspirant deodorants of every variety, I was well on my way to having to go as far as surgery. I tried this stuff to check the block expecting the same results I always get. Soaking wet shirt pits by 8AM. After a few weeks, I started being able to go all day without having to change my shirt. That was 2 years ago, and I've been religiously using this weekly since. I don't ruin shirts anymore, can wear something other than black and am totally thrilled. It's only $2 a week, give it a go if you're on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Bushie

customer_reviews.title: So it really does work!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of anything promising to stop underarm sweat for a whole week, but it really did. After dramatically increasing my morning caffeine intake recently, I would have a flop sweat for the next hour that left me sitting in the office with a pitted out shirt by 9am. Sweatblock left me completely dry for 5 days after the first use with still decreased sweat for the next few days. After a few weeks of use I have to apply it slightly more often to get the same degree of effect, but even once a week is enough if all I need is normal, non embarrassing levels of sweat. Can't recommend trying it enough to anyone struggling with hyperhydrosis.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Helps, but doesn’t eliminate
customer_reviews.text: I have had hyperhidrosis of the underarms for 20 years ago. I’ve tried prescription deodorants and clinical strength deodorants. They help but don’t eliminate. That’s kind of how this is for me. It helps, but doesn’t eliminate. It also seems inconsistent and I’m not sure why? And I don’t mean at the end of the 7 days. I’m not sure. I guess my body chemistry is just all over the place. I will repurchase. I like being able to use this once a week and use my natural deodorants each morning. It makes me feel like it’s better for my body even though I’m sure it’s not >_<
customer_reviews.author: Mandi G

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: I have tried EVERYTHING. The closest one product came to working was ZeroSweat. ZeroSweat changed something and it stopped being effective so I tried this. To my amazement, it is the only thing that completely worked. It says once a week, I do once everyday 2 - 3 days because I sweat bad. Now, I can wear any color t-shirts, without constantly worrying about sweat coming through. If you deal with it severely as I do, try this..It works for me 100%, thank you SweatBlock.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the Best!!
customer_reviews.text: I am female but have always had a issue with sweating a lot. Now being menopausal ( hot flashes) and being a healthcare worker on the front line during this Covid 19 pandemic, I’m in PPE and a blistering hot N95 mask daily for hours so I sweat big time!! This has been an absolute God send!! I wish I found Seeat Block years ago. I recommend not using it after shaving arm pits, dabbing don’t rub it on or it stings. But, this stuff honestly works for 1week! I highly recommend. One draw back is the scent. Kind of pungent. But still well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LovinLifeLivinLarge

customer_reviews.title: Results May Vary with Supplement Usage
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! At first, it did not work because the weight loss supplement that I was taking was raising my core temperature in order to boost my metabolism. I was sweating profusely without even trying. Needless to say, it defeated the purpose of using this product. I stopped using the weight loss supplement and POOF.....Sweat Block worked. I'm very happy and my sweat is no longer ruining my blouses for work :-)
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: It works! Really really works!
customer_reviews.text: Really works! Before I started using these, my underarms would sweat almost immediately after getting out the shower and deodorant did nothing to mask the odor or stop the sweat. After using these, I stay fresh ALL DAY and it lasts for about a week. I couldn’t imagine another summer or even meeting without them-I no longer deal with the embarrassment of sweaty and stinky underarms. Only con is the smell is kinda strong (not unpleasant though) before u wash it off the next morning but DEFINITELY worth it, hands down. I’m gonna be a lifelong customer!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: very recommended
customer_reviews.text: my best deodrant I take every time many boxes of it especially for hot weather and hard work it keeps me dry, clean and smell good
customer_reviews.author: m.I.

customer_reviews.title: Hyperhidrosis... It's not fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you're not wanting to go to your doctor to get a prescription for a topical hyperhidrosis treatment. With that said, I never liked you had to touch the application cloth with your fingers while applying the sweat-block. It made my fingers feel dry and a little tingly, even after washing. After about six months of using these, I went to my doctor - and the prescription I received came in a bottle that could be applied without my fingers touching the solution. This product definitely works if used correctly... but there are better solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: RASH 2 days later!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active job and take medication that cause hyperhidrosis. I followed directions and the next day found it worked a little, but not enough. As the directions stated, I applied again the following night. The next day I noticed when I was active, the spots I applied to were tingly and like prickles and needles and itchy at the same time. A few hours later I developed a red rash where the product was placed (underarms and between the girls to stave off excessive shirt drench.) It's definitely not worth the reaction. I'll continue to change my shirt 3+ times a day rather than risk getting this rash.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine1234

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This product is magic. I sometimes experience nervous sweating at work mainly with specific fabrics like satin top. I didn believe that this would honestly stop me from sweating but somehow I don’t even realize but at the end of the day there is no wetness under my arms and admits fabric is dry. And it this is my very first time trying and literally lasted the whole week. I will be testing it further hoping for the midsummer time when it s blistering hot. I work in office and sometimes it s kind of chilly yet my underarms are wet so hoping this will tackle that problem as well as hot summer days and cute outfits
customer_reviews.author: Czekchik

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was weary when I purchased this product. After reading the reviews, I decided to give it a try. I tend to sweat a lot and was very self conscious about it. After my second use, I noticed a huge difference in my sweating! I will say, the first time I used it my skin did sting a little but I also have somewhat sensitive skin. After a couple uses, the sting went away and now I have no issues! I think it just took some getting use to and now it works great and there is no sting! I am much for confident in my everyday now and highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It freaking works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first when I was reading the reviews and looking this up. I live in a very hot climate and mostly wear tank tops because I’ve always since I can remember had an issue with excessive sweating. As soon as I got it, I tried it that night. Today was day 1 and it’s the first day I haven’t sweat through a shirt in years, literally. My pits stayed dry for hours, even through working out. I’m amazed! I will for sure be buying more when I run out
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Ray

customer_reviews.title: If you sweat a lot you need these
customer_reviews.text: Love these. As someone who sweats a LOT and wears a lot of silk tops, these are a lifesaver. I use one pad about once a week before bed, let it dry, and throw on a white t-shirt (I’ve heard discoloration can occur). I still use deodorant and the combo keeps me dry. As a note, upon application it can sting a little or get itchy, especially if you have sensitive skin, so I’d always recommend use before bed. The few minutes of slight discomfort is worth it. I notice a huge difference if go awhile without these.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for me!
customer_reviews.text: Will order again very pleased and it smells like cloves ..so I like the smell :) so happy to find these ..I didn’t read directions and shaved my arm pits and then wiped them and didn’t dab ..stung a sec but no issue ..but it does say to dab and have done that since .. ordering more! Thanks for making these!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this product as 4.95 stars. The 1/2 star I deleted because it doesn't quite last a full 7 days in the very hot, very humid Ga. summer weather ( Think walking out your front door into a sauna every morning. Seriously.) That said, if it works for me in this climate, I would imagine it would work for anyone! I've had no skin irritation from blotting it under arms, even after shaving. It has a very mild life-like scent when freshly applied, but this fades quickly after application. Overall, a great product that I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Ray

customer_reviews.title: It absolutely makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I have had trouble finding products that would reduce my sweat. I stumbled across this product several times but was afraid to try it with claims it would completely stop sweat. However, after finally purchasing it and using it I can absolutely say that these claims were not inaccurate. I now have the ability to go through an entire week without worrying about excessive sweat. It has helped me significantly and I suggest that you give it a try, no matter how hesitant you might be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but...
customer_reviews.text: I could definitely notice less sweat but man do these suckers burn. This product really dried my skin out and itched and burned. I'm not sure if it's worth it to me. Understand that everyone is different so these may work for you. I don't normally have sensitive skin but these are a doozy. I gave three stars because I hardly had any sweat for about 5 days with two consecutive days application. I just don't think I can bring myself to continue using it though. Try at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Reduced underarm sweat
customer_reviews.text: This did a great job significantly reducing my underarm sweat, but it definitely didn't completely stop it. Make sure you follow the application directions. I have sensitive skin and have had issues in the past with other prescription strength antiperspirant products but I don't have a problem with this and I use them about twice a week. The wipe strangely smell like pickles while you're waiting for it to dry but the smell goes away after a few mins. I also make sure to wear a deodorant because these wipes only reduce sweating but they don't control odor.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda 1

customer_reviews.title: Las Vegas summer weather approved
customer_reviews.text: Works super well with my hyperhidrosis! I've tried other products, including prescription deodorant and it burned my skin. These wipes go on well, sting a bit if you've scratched your armpits but nothing major. Has not stained my shirts like other products and easy to use! I can finally wear shirts with sleeves again without a sweater or constantly checking for the wetness under my arms. I was worried about sweating more in other areas, but nope, all good! Make sure to still use a mild deodorant daily to keep fresh. I live in Vegas and this product saved me from getting Botox in my armpits to reduce the wetness.
customer_reviews.author: Khalileah

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product. Buy this if you have any sweating issues!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I’ve used to date. Both prescription and over the counter. If used properly as the instructions state you should see results within 2-3 uses. I’m a heavy sweater. If I use this consistently for 3-4 applications over a 2 week period I can skip using deodorant on some days with almost no sweat! Highly recommend this. It will change your life if you battle sweat problems. I use it on my hand and feet also with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: SweatBlock Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Vegas, obviously, summers are hot. SweatBlock once a week and then normal deodorant use during the week keeps me from being too sweaty and too smelly, even in temperatures that exceed 100 degrees regularly. Even with regular workouts I still smell fresh. I don't have pit stains in my clothing and I don't worry about offending others with my scent. It's a winner for me.... I have it on Subscribe & Save!
customer_reviews.author: jillwillrun

customer_reviews.title: Just use a good moisturizer and the product will continue to work
customer_reviews.text: As previous reviewers have said it works in any area you need sweat relief. My face sweats profusely and with sweat block it stays dry for about 10 days between applications. There is usually some dryness and slight tightening of the skin the morning after application. Just use a good moisturizer and the product will continue to work. Sweat Block has definitely improved my confidence when meeting people for the first time. I no longer worry about the drenched look giving people a bad impression of me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hyperhidrosis sufferers, give this a try!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait a week before reviewing this item. All I can say is.....wow. I suffer from hyperhidrosis, and it has led me to constantly wear dark shirts, multiple layers of clothing, and even straight up not going anywhere just to hide the embarrassment of wet armpits and stains. Sweat block actually does what it is named after. After almost 2 weeks of use, my sweating has been reduced to very minimal, if any at all. I can comfortably wear brighter shirts and less layers without worrying of hyperhidrosis induced sweat stains. My confidence has benefited from this product, and as long as it continues to work, I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.T

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was about to make a Dr.'s appointment to stop the ridiculous sweating. I would ruin my shirts and it was embarrassing to always have to check myself before I raised my arms. I use to sweat just sitting at my desk working...no I'm not overweight I just sweat a lot. This stuff did the trick, I applied it 3 days ago and followed the instructions and am still dry. It doesn't have an odor to it and you can still apply deodorant if needed (I don't but its an option).
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: It works well! Since I was a teenager I have been excessively sweating... hot or cold. So uncomfortable to be freezing and have wet pits, Not to mention wardrobe is VERY limited. I thought about Botox but just don’t want to spend quite a bit of money for my arm pits. These wipes are great they work well. The effects last about a week for me. I am happy I found these and they work. I put it on after I shower at night then wake up and rinse off. It does give me some irritation/ itchy for a few minutes. For those who have tried these and they don’t work I’m sorry!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: I really thought it wouldn’t work. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t remember how I happened upon this product, but I am glad that I did! I tend to sweat a lot under my arms and clinical strength deodorant doesn’t cut it. I decided to give these a try. I cannot even describe how shocked I was at how well they work. I thought maybe it would take a few weeks for it to work properly but it worked the very first day. I was in my kitchen cooking with the stove AND oven going- and I didn’t sweat one bit under my arms. I couldn’t believe it. I’ve told my friends and I’m definitely a fan.
customer_reviews.author: CBreezy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because I've tried so many different types of clinical strength antiperspirants that did nothing to stop the sweating under my arms, and I'm pretty sure I have hyperhydrosis... But this stuff actually works! I'm on day four and still dry as can be! The smell when you first put it on and the product is still wet, is... Different. Kind of a cinnamon smell. Not terrible but not ideal, however it goes away quickly once the product dries. I'm so glad I tried this!
customer_reviews.author: crowhere

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, secret in the description
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical to try this. But it’s actually amazing!! I sweat a lot at work. because of the heat. It lasts a good few days. Probably more than it does for me if you don’t work in 99+ conditions. But 5ish days for me. First time I used it, it stung a little but after that first time it’s been fine since. ALSO if you seal the pouch super well you can use the same wipe more than once!! I am curious if it would work on the forehead and under breast sweat LOL
customer_reviews.author: Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Useful thing you never knew you needed!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a backpacking trip, 25 miles in length. I didn’t stink! These wipes are the bomb! You stink like licorice when you put it on the night before, but they work! My sweat doesn’t stink, but I sweat a lot! I used these bad boys and man oh man they’re awesome! If I have to do any physical activity where I can’t sweat too much, I use them!! Great for hot days when you don’t want to sweat on silk shirts or dresses too.
customer_reviews.author: beccalee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and made by underarms very sore. Had my sister in law try as well and it did the same thing to her. Tried to get my money back and amazon said you could not do this on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Really great! ACTUALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this actually works. I work in an office with poor Air Conditioning (too open a space and too cheap an employer to keep the poor AC on) where we need to dress business casual. No matter what, every day i was getting pit marks on my shirt. If you're reading this, it's probably for a similar reason and you know how embarrassing that is. I'm a heavy sweater. With the poor AC, just sitting at my desk makes me sweat and causes the pit stains. This has saved my shirts and makes me feel more professional at work.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Robesh

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but SweatBlock merits one. Since puberty, I'd had a serious sweating problem. My armpits used to literally drip and I tried every product imaginable to stem the tide: under the counter, over the counter, behind the counter, and in a back alley (joking...mostly). Nothing worked. SweatBlock works. I don't want to know how it works (something this effective will surely kill you eventually, right?), but as long as it keeps my shirts sweat free in the depths of summer and winter (What kind of freak sweats in the winter? Answer: Me.), I'll keep coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I primarily sweat from my face- forehead and I used these on my face for 3 days straight before a big even where I knew i'd be outside. The sweat was cut in half. It was amazing and I feel confident in using them in other places too. The smell is wonky but if you apply at night (As recommended), you just wash it off the next day so that doesn't bother me much. A must have if you are constantly worried about too much sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product that works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.text: Originally heard about this product on Reddit. I ordered it to see how it works as even using store bought “clinical strength” antiperspirant I still sweat buckets during the summer heat. The application is a bit different as it’s a moist towelette, and it does sting just a tad bit (could be I have sensitive skin) but this product works extremely well, when I tell you I didn’t sweat, I didn’t at all. It’s almost unbelievable how well these work. A solid product I will be recommending to my friends who may also suffer.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanial Madanick

customer_reviews.title: Stops the sweat!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It doesn't stink when you put it on - great! It does get itchy the first few times though. I just waited till it dried, then put some anti-itch cream on and I was good, but those with more sensitive skin might have an issue. This stuff works, though! I am sweating WAY less, and in a tropical climate - that's fantastic! I can wear shirts I haven't been able to wear since I moved here!! And some that I wasn't able to wear for more than a few hours because of pit stains!
customer_reviews.author: Typhani

customer_reviews.title: Best thing every!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread for this guy. I sweat a lot. So much that I had to chose shirts that would hide it. I was skeptical but I am now on month 3 and this is amazing. I recommend this to anyone who has stress sweat. There was maybe one day when I probably waited to long between applications thatbi had a small amount in the pits. Applied that night and issue was resolved going forward. I apply every 6 days. Thank you to the manufacturer and researchers who developed this.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Works great for moderate sweating
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with severe hyperhidrosis since highschool. I have done Botox under the arms and had a medical procedure done but I would still rate myself as a 8-9 on scale of 1-10 of severity. Sweat block is a great product, however with my severity, I find I have to use it every other night to stay dry. It gets expensive quick when using it that often so I have decided to try other products. I have recommended this to several of my friends though! If your sweating isn’t extremely bad, this product should work amazing for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brewskisteve

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with Hyperhidrosis
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for the first time last night and I have to say...AMAZING! For the past 6 months I have been dealing with hyperhidrosis due to hormone imbalance. Normally I have to reapply my deodorant 3 to 4 times a day (clinical strength), but after using sweatblock once I stayed smelling fresh for a full 24 hours, with not even a hint of body odor. I am hoping it continues to work this beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: AriannaL

customer_reviews.title: cheaper than going to a dermatologist for prescribed wipes or Botox
customer_reviews.text: This works and is cheaper than going to a dermatologist for prescribed wipes or Botox injection. My dermatologist prescribed me wipes which I chose not to pay for I just came on amazon and found these. Im a heavy armpit sweater. I applied the wipes 2 nights in a row after that my armpits completely shut down for 3 days. Zero sweat. Does t sting or bleach the color of armpits like the old school topicals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more swampy summers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that combats my sweat during summer in the Deep South. I love this stuff! When you open the wipe, it smells almost like cinnamon (I find it pleasant). The scent is light and doesn’t linger. I have sensitive skin, and it does tingle a bit if you rub (dab only!). It dries fairly quickly but is a little tacky until you shower the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: owd

customer_reviews.title: OMG! Something that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Something that actually works! I have had issues with excessive underarm sweat my whole life. I've tried dozens of different types of antiperspirants with no luck or any results. I've even considered medical procedures to help correct this issue. I read about this product and was very skeptical. Just rub it on (well dab it on actually). Go to sleep. And then you won't sweat? Well, guess what? It works. Very well. Not sure how. Don't care. I've been able to wear clothes in my wardrobe that I normally would sweat thru or have embarrassing sweat marks. Love the product. Wish the price was a little lower, but for the results, I'm very happy. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gargano

customer_reviews.title: Works well. But I don’t know about long term effects.
customer_reviews.text: Actually works very well for about 6 days for me. I swear profusely even in very cold rooms (my office is always set to 68 degrees). And if I don’t have a shirt on I will drip sweat just sitting around. This doubles when I’m nervous. The product works well. I don’t know if there are any long term effects (like Alzheimers) so I don’t use it often. The pads themselves have a very nice scent (I know it’s not a deodorant) though it is strange.
customer_reviews.author: ♥ichigo♥

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is life changing
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and sweat a lot...this stuff will change your life. I used to be a sweat through my shirt in 5 minutes guy...now there is almost no sweat. I apply Sweatblock once per week and I'm good to go. If you have issues with sweating and it causes you embarrassment...check this stuff out. Not only has it worked for me but my daughter recently tied it and now she is a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: This is strange stuff. I read many of the reviews, saw that some people were burned by it, but I also get face sweats from menopause. For my skin, a bit sensitive, it caused burning and itching such that I tried it a few times and just didn't want to put it on my face anymore. I then thought to put it on my feet, didn't think it did a thing. So, I'd say if you have sweating issues, and you can swing the price, it's likely worth giving it a go. It seemed to really work for many people.
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: Stopped My Problem!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I was skeptical but they work so well! I apply them once a week and still apply daily deodorant as well. I hardly sweat anymore and can even wear grey tops without any issue. The smell is a little pungent but it’s not bad once you get used to it. Don’t use it after shaving or it burns and itches pretty bad. My skin is sensitive and has mostly held up well with these. I have had some burning and itching but nothing unbearable. Highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a cheap solution.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I don't use this for my armpits, I use it on my face. I excessively sweat, but as long as people can't easily see it on my face, I'm happy. The "towelettes" smell like cloves - I love it! And since I've used similar products under my arms previously, I'm familiar with the itchy-stingy feeling on my face. I usually wait 10-30 mins to apply lotion afterwards - however long I can stand the tingling. It really does last close to a week and for the duration (after the initial application), the tingling is rare; usually when your pores would've produced sweat, but aren't.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pete

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling, to avoid having to carry the usual bulky antiperspirant package. (The travel-sized ones are almost as large, and so wasteful...) This did work. I used it once before departing on a two-week trip, and twice during the trip. I was hoping to avoid doing laundry a lot. In the end, I managed twelve days with just three shirts, and none of my traveling companions had any complaints. I didn't notice much irritation.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingSnail

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS !!!!  LIFE SAVER and GAME CHANGER  !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever used for my sweat issues. This is a must have if you experience embarrassing underarm sweat pits in your collar shirts. This product has been life changing for me and I am no longer scared to wear light colored dress shirts to presentation meetings. THIS PRODUCT WORKS as long as you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously works! Used after a shower as directed before bed and have tried it on armipts, face/hairline, upper thighs/groin, chest/trunk so far. 1 towelette can be used for multiple places. Felt some itching around face/hairline after application but was gone byorning when I woke up. Lasts over a week for me. Have been telling people about it and handed a few out. Prayers answered for those with serious sweating issues.
customer_reviews.author: D-Ack

customer_reviews.title: When allowed to DRYYYYYYY this is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing ! Ive gone 15 yrs trying to find a solution. I think the reason people don’t think this works is a few things. First before you start fresh and don’t LOCK in bacteria and crap first detox your armpits. Exfoliate them and scrub with baking soda! Then use a blow dryer and dry completely (have to do this at night) then dab on the product and do not put your arms down into dry then All I do is rinse my armpits with vinegar everyday and I apply the sweat block at night every 4 days ! I don’t need deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why these work so well, since they do not appear to contain any ground-breaking ingredients, but they DO work! I am a very heavy sweater. I still sweat but I have seen a huge reduction in the amount I sweat after using the wipes only once a week. It’s a game-changer. My only suggestion would be to replace the clove smell. I understand they’re probably going for a unisex scent, but there has to be a better alternative than clove. Luckily, the scent does not last very long. Conclusion, excellent for those with hyperhidrosis. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Works for the first use
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the person who said this worked very well the first time I used it. The second and third times I did not notice the same result. I was paranoid about getting a chemical burn so I followed the instructions exactly, and it does not bother my sensitive skin. Unfortunately, it does not really work as well after the first use, it still improves things but not quite as well.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely AMAZE BALLS!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was obsessed with feat that people could smell me. Use this now and am absolutely amazed. No smell. Had son try it and it worked great on him too, (police officer that wears undershirt, bulletproof vest, police uniform shirt plus 40+ pounds of gear. He could get ripe on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Talley

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product for hyperhidrosis and atopic dermatitis sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: Cured my armpit rash! I’ve had horrible armpit rashes for 2 years. Went to dermatologist. Tried every cream, spray, medication you can think of. Tried EVERY deodorant and antiperspirant imaginable, regular and organic. Nothing worked. Sweat block works! Once a week and it keeps me dry. I use scent less deodorant on top. I can’t believe my armpits are clear and not itchy anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah HIerro

customer_reviews.title: Very Irritating to skin and painful!!
customer_reviews.text: Used ONCE AND ONLY ONCE by my 17 yr old son, who complains about excessive underarm sweating. He does NOT have sensitive skin or allergies to anything! Followed the instructions and applied at night, after showering, to dry underarms, before bed and let dry completely. He woke up with his armpits "feeling like they were on fire", red and swollen!! Very disappointing and upsetting. Will never use again!! Much better dealing with some underarm sweat than not being able to bring arm downs along sides, without being in serious pain!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Hafer

customer_reviews.title: I can see an improvement
customer_reviews.text: I'm not exactly the sweatiest person around. Some days I can push a lawnmower for hours and barely break a sweat. Other days I'll break out in a sweat after just walking from my house to the car. It's unpredictable. Anyway, I bought this product to prevent that from happening. While there was clearly less sweat, it was still fairly visible. Your results may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference for me.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice a difference personally like the previous reviews stated. Maybe it’s a a more serious underlying issue, but I’ve struggled with underarm sweat since high school and after trying this product as the instructions stated, I didn’t find any noticeable relief unfortunately. I will just have to keep looking for a product that works over the counter or go to a doctor and inquire about prescription strength products.
customer_reviews.author: lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for everyone...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from secondary hyperhidrosis—which basically means I have periods of excessive sweating multiple times every day. Since this significantly impacts my willingness to be in public for very long, I was hoping that the Sweat Block wipes might bring my sweating down to around normal. Unfortunately, despite the fact that I used them exactly as instructed, they affected me not at all and did almost nothing. The tiny reduction in sweating this product gives, if it does give any at whatsoever, is hardly worth the price at which it is listed. Of course, the wipes may work for other people; but they certainly didn't work in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A-MA-ZING
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought these on accident. I thought they were the shields you put on your clothes. But there they were..and there I was. First off, it smells like potpourri, which was quite unusual. But y'all..this has been AMAZING. For whatever reason, even when I'm not hot, I've got leaky armpits. 90% of my clothes are black. But now... I can wear colors again! AND I don't have sweat patches 5 minutes into getting dressed! This was obviously meant to be and I'm sold. 😂🙌
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought Sweatblock and it has only been a week but it has worked great! Usually after a long day I would have pit stains on my shirts, but after using Sweatblock my shirts are dry. Even after a workout my armpits stay mostly dry. Although while working out I don’t check the armpit of my shirt or my armpits, they don’t feel sticky after a workout like before. I would recommend using this product, the only bad thing is there really isn’t a smell and the box only contains an 8 week supply.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Voege

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again but be careful
customer_reviews.text: It appears to work for the most part. The only issue I had with it was that shortly after applying, the areas where it was applied would feel tingly & kind of hurt a little. Once that wore off, it was fine. I shaved a day and half prior to applying, since it says not to apply 12 hrs or so after shaving. Overall, I would buy it again because it did work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: or the irritation of your armpits will be bad and you might get some body odor
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is legit. It truly does reduce armpit wetness significantly. Follow the package directions and apply at bedtime. Your armpits will feel weird and tingly, and you might feel irritated, but it does work. Use an antiperperant in the morning or your armpits will still sweat, smell, and feel more irritated. You might have to use a towelette every night until it builds up enough defense against wetness, then you can use every other night, or so, but...it does seriously work. You cannot skip wearing regular deoderant or antiperperant, or the irritation of your armpits will be bad and you might get some body odor.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I know I sweat pretty badly and I probably sweat on the slightly worse side of people who sweat pretty bad, but when used correctly this product does its job extremely well. There are times where I feel like it's not doing as good of a job as I expect, but again, that's probably because I sweat really bad. Just make sure you apply this as it says on the packaging which is the night before. Don't try to put this on quickly before you head out on a date or something to try to impress him/her with your lack of sweaty armpits. It doesn't work that fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give me a rash
customer_reviews.text: Makes my underarms itch and burn. I have a hard time falling asleep because it make my underarms uncomfortable then I wake up with a rash in the morning and seem to sweat more because my skin is irritated. After a day or so the rash goes away and I do sweat less. This product is just as irritating as certaindri. I used to used certaindri then a couple years ago something changed and it started aggravating my skin. I was hoping this would be gentler but it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Betz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, drastically reduced excessive sweating
customer_reviews.text: I excessively sweat on my face and forehead when I work hard or when I'm in stressful situations, like an interview, which is quite embarrassing. I gave this product a try and it really helped. So far, I haven't had any adverse skin reactions. My only complaint is the strong cinnamon and clove scent. I didn't remove a star because I'm applying it to my face where the scent becomes much more apparent. When I apply to my hands, I don't notice it too much. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Product works as advertised by its maker, User has been employing a different product previous to my purchasing this one for her, says it works just as well as the other one and it's somewhat less expensive to buy on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Szczepkowski

customer_reviews.title: I was actually confident to wear one of my shirts that I just don't wear because it shows me sweating so bad.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work. If you sweat and need to wear a shirt that showes arm pit sweat the use this product. Follow the directions. Wash under your arms, dry off, rub the sweat block on. I would suggest if you are a guy and have hairy armpits to trim the hair so the sweat block reaches your skin. It will not work if you rub it under your arms and have a bunch of hair blocking it from having contact with your skin. I was actually confident to wear one of my shirts that I just don't wear because it shows me sweating so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Bear

customer_reviews.title: interesting smell but works
customer_reviews.text: When you first apply it, the toilette does have a weird scent but it's not overbearing. The one thing I noticed is that when I used it, i started sweating more in other areas, for example, my feet. I did not get a rash, but I also don't have super sensitive skin. I read other reviews and made sure it NOT shave my armpits and then use it the same night because it's caused some people rash. I will say though sometimes my armpits felt itchy but it could be my deodorant too. I would recommend shaving at night and then applying it the next night.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: For most of my life my underarms have sweat like crazy, no matter the temperature or activity. I decided to try this and ever since I haven't had a problem. I apply once a week before bed and I no longer have to change my shirt three times a day. I have extremely sensitive skin and only experience a very very slight burning that only lasts a few minutes. Thanks SweatBlock!
customer_reviews.author: Travis L

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: This thing DID NOT work at all. I followed every instruction with detail and it still did not do anything. I had to call my doctor so he could prescribe me something (Drysol), and guess what? It worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional use, maybe more
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would be the holy grail, but not quite for me :( Worked great the first few days but then started to lose its potency for me even though I replied. First time I applied, it was quite itchy/stingy, not as much on the other times. I will still be ordering more in the future because I believe that it will work for me if I use it only on occasion. I think it will be great for most people, but my facial sweating is out of control.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Torre

customer_reviews.title: Sweatblock is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Began using it a few weeks ago, hoping that I wasn't allergic and I wasn't, now I don't have to change shirts twice a day or be embarrassed about my soaked underarms. I only use it one a week and it lasts for the full 7 days for me. I highly suggest that if you have a "sweat concern" that you try it ASAP. You won't regret it. Please check with your Doctor about allergies to the active ingredients just to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: emmy kaye

customer_reviews.title: Eugenol, yuck! But it works!
customer_reviews.text: This product works well, my only complaint is with the smell. They use Eugenol in it which smells like cinnamon or cloves to most people. Unfortunately, this ingredient is also used in dentistry so for me its like getting cavities filled every time I apply it. I will stick with a similar product that does not have the smell for now- but if you are fine with the smell then get these. They will keep your underarms dry without irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Riau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but super itchy.
customer_reviews.text: They are superb! Life saver for heavy sweaters!Yet I felt incredibly tingly & discomforts after I put them on until I fell in asleep. I used it for foreheads, arms, and under arms. I don't recommend for people with sensitive skin like me. Yet these are so affective for me. Once you applied the night before, You feel heat when you get hot then you feel like its about to sweat crazily and ready to ger embarrassed, but only feel dryness on the area where you applied the night before. I am also not a fan of the scent.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have hyperhidrosis and this product did not work for me. It says good for 7 days after one use. I tried for the first day and continued to sweat through my shirt the next day. I continued to reapply for the next few days. The sweat was reduced a little bit after continuous use(more than once a week), but i was still sweating through my shirt. The only product that ever worked for me was “Drysol”, so im gonna try using that one again. Sweatblock just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are awesome! The first week I used them it lasted about 5 days, not 7. The second week it lasted a little longer- I'm not sure if the more you use them, the better they work as your body gets used to it. I sweat a lot, even indoors, and it causes me to shy away from wearing certain colors. These wipes are so much better than any anti-persperant I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Debi

product_meta.title: SweatBlock Clinical Strength Antiperspirant Wipes- Treat Hyperhidrosis & Excessive Sweating - Up to 7 Days Protection Per Wipe - 10 count - Unisex
feature_bullets: STOP EMBARRASSING SWEAT BEFORE IT STOPS YOU - Wear the clothes you love and stay confident with SweatBlock underarm antiperspirant wipes. Stop hiding sweaty armpits and start living confidently. Strong anti-sweat protection for men, women, and teens.

FOR HYPERHIDROSIS TREATMENT & EXCESSIVE SWEATING - Clinical strength antiperspirant wipe strong enough for hyperhidrosis, nervous sweating, hormonal sweating, and perspiration due to prescription drug side-effects.

RAISE YOUR ARMS WITHOUT WORRY - Hug and high-five with confidence. Beat excessive sweat and stop sweating with SweatBlock Antiperspirant. Also great as a clinical strength deodorant: Stop underarm sweat, stop underarm odor.
DOCTOR CREATED. DOCTOR RECOMMENDED - Apply at night before bed - Up to 7 days protection per use - Safe, strong, and proven - Featured on The Rachael Ray Show & The Today Show.

LOVE IT, OR IT'S FREE - "Dry Shirt Guarantee" - Wear the shirts you love without pitting-out or your money back. 100% satisfaction guarantee. Proudly made in the USA. No Parabens, Phthalates, or animal testing.
